languages.text: Кьяве Гамма будет дарован святой рескрипт-инструкция, дозволяющий производство военной техники. В торжественном мерцании люменов пробудятся ярые духи машин ударных танков, бронированных транспортов и артиллерийских платформ, алча крови еретиков и ксеносов.

Kiava Gamma will be granted a sacred writ authorising the production of war machines. Amid the solemn flickering of lumens, fierce machine spirits of battle tanks, armoured transports, and artillery cannons will awaken, craving the blood of heretics and xenos.
languages.original_text: Кьяве Гамма будет дарован святой рескрипт-инструкция, дозволяющий производство военной техники. В торжественном мерцании люменов пробудятся ярые духи машин ударных танков, бронированных транспортов и артиллерийских платформ, алча крови еретиков и ксеносов.

traits.locale_text: Kiava Gamma will be granted a sacred writ authorising the production of war machines. Amid the solemn flickering of lumens, the fierce machine spirits of battle tanks, armoured transports, and artillery cannons will awaken to crave the blood of heretics and xenos.

Kiava Gamma will be granted a sacred writ authorising the production of war machines. Amid the solemn flickering of lumens, fierce machine spirits of battle tanks, armoured transports, and artillery cannons will awaken, craving the blood of heretics and xenos.

languages.text: Kiava Gamma recevra un décret sacré autorisant la production de machines de guerre. Dans le scintillement solennel des lumens, les esprits farouches des chars de combat, des transports blindés et des canons d'artillerie s'éveilleront, avides du sang des hérétiques et des xénos.
languages.original_text: Kiava Gamma will be granted a sacred writ authorising the production of war machines. Amid the solemn flickering of lumens, fierce machine spirits of battle tanks, armoured transports, and artillery cannons will awaken, craving the blood of heretics and xenos.

traits.locale_text: Kiava Gamma recevra un décret sacré autorisant la production de machines de guerre. Dans le scintillement solennel des lumens, les esprits farouches des chars de combat, des transports blindés et des canons d'artillerie s'éveilleront, avides du sang des hérétiques et des xénos.

languages.text: キアヴァ・ガンマは、戦争機の製造を許可する神聖な書状を与えられる。荘厳な光の明滅の中、戦車、装甲輸送船、大砲の獰猛な機械精霊が目覚め、異端者や異種族の血を渇望する。
languages.original_text: Kiava Gamma will be granted a sacred writ authorising the production of war machines. Amid the solemn flickering of lumens, fierce machine spirits of battle tanks, armoured transports, and artillery cannons will awaken, craving the blood of heretics and xenos.

traits.locale_text: キアヴァ・ガンマは、戦争機の製造を許可する神聖な書状を与えられる。荘厳な光の明滅の中、戦車、装甲輸送船、大砲の獰猛な機械精霊が目覚め、異端者や異種族の血を渇望する。

languages.text: 基亚瓦伽马星将被授予生产战争机器的神圣令状。在流明灯庄严的闪烁中，战争坦克、武装运输车和加农炮中的狂暴机魂将被唤醒，准备渴饮异端与异形的鲜血。
languages.original_text: Kiava Gamma will be granted a sacred writ authorising the production of war machines. Amid the solemn flickering of lumens, fierce machine spirits of battle tanks, armoured transports, and artillery cannons will awaken, craving the blood of heretics and xenos.

traits.locale_text: 基亚瓦伽马星将被授予生产战争机器的神圣令状。在流明灯庄严的闪烁中，战争坦克、武装运输车和加农炮中的狂暴机魂将被唤醒，准备渴饮异端与异形的鲜血。

languages.text: Kiava Gamma recibirá un mandato sagrado que autoriza la producción de máquinas de guerra. En medio del parpadeo solemne de las luces, se despertarán feroces espíritus máquina de carros de combate, transportes blindados y cañones de artillería sedientos de sangre de herejes y xenos.
languages.original_text: Kiava Gamma will be granted a sacred writ authorising the production of war machines. Amid the solemn flickering of lumens, fierce machine spirits of battle tanks, armoured transports, and artillery cannons will awaken, craving the blood of heretics and xenos.

traits.locale_text: Kiava Gamma recibirá un mandato sagrado que autoriza la producción de máquinas de guerra. En medio del parpadeo solemne de las luces, se despertarán feroces espíritus máquina de carros de combate, transportes blindados y cañones de artillería sedientos de sangre de herejes y xenos.

languages.text: Kiava Gamma erhält eine heilige Urkunde, die den Bau von Kriegsmaschinen erlaubt. Unter dem ernsten Flackern von Lumens werden bald wilde Maschinengeister für Kampfpanzer, gepanzerte Transporter und Artilleriegeschützen erwachen, die sich nach dem Blut von Ketzern und Xenos sehnen.
languages.original_text: Kiava Gamma will be granted a sacred writ authorising the production of war machines. Amid the solemn flickering of lumens, fierce machine spirits of battle tanks, armoured transports, and artillery cannons will awaken, craving the blood of heretics and xenos.

traits.locale_text: Kiava Gamma erhält eine heilige Urkunde, die den Bau von Kriegsmaschinen erlaubt. Unter dem ernsten Flackern von Lumens werden bald wilde Maschinengeister für Kampfpanzer, gepanzerte Transporter und Artilleriegeschützen erwachen, die sich nach dem Blut von Ketzern und Xenos sehnen.

languages.text: Kiava Gama'ya savaş makinelerinin üretimi için mukaddes bir ferman bahşedilecek. Muharebe tanklarının hırçın makine ruhları, zırhlı nakil araçları ve ağır toplar; lümenler hep birlikte heybetle titreşirken kâfirlerin ve zenoların kanlarına susamış hâlde uyanacak.
languages.original_text: Kiava Gamma will be granted a sacred writ authorising the production of war machines. Amid the solemn flickering of lumens, fierce machine spirits of battle tanks, armoured transports, and artillery cannons will awaken, craving the blood of heretics and xenos.
